name: We Have A Problem
description:
We Have A Problem

You are Mark Watts (PhD in Applied Physics & Winging It), the first and only crew member of Apollo 403. Apparently, single crewed space missions are "safe" in 2052. 

You have completed your highly important mission on the planet Pluto and are on your way home. What could go wrong? Hint: You are gonna have to MacGyver the s*** out of this.

Controls

W, A, D  to move

E  to grab and throw items

Left Mouse Button to aim and activate jetpack propulsion

How To Play

Your ship is about to explode! 

Each floor has equipment in need of repair. Certain items can be combined by pushing them together. Bring the correct items to the equipment to repair them. 

Hurry! You don't have all the time in the world space.

PS, the radio is your best friend.
